name: Classic Memories
description: Custom DVD Slideshows and Photo Books
overview:
Classic Memories, an e-commerce business, professionally transforms customer’s photographs from any event into stunning, custom DVD Slideshows or Photo Books.

Their mission is to produce high quality products that are distinctive and memorable, and are packaged in a modern design. The products they offer are available to anyone living within the United States. Their user friendly website will allow their customers to review services in detail, place custom orders, upload photographs, and finalize credit card purchases using a secure online shopping cart.

Classic Memories offers three packages for each of their products, DVD Slideshows and Photo Books. Each package varies in sophistication and price.

DVD Slideshows are an excellent way to preserve your photos and showcase them on your television, computer, or your mobile device via YouTube™. The slideshows are professionally designed and customized to the customer’s specifications, including: 40 or more photographs set to a theme, sequence, and soundtrack. Our customers have the option to upload their finished slideshow to YouTube.

Photo Books are a terrific way to display your photos to your family and friends. The Photo Books may contain up to 50 photographs and are professionally designed, customized, and printed to the customer’s specifications. Customers will be offered a choice of binding, page color and sequence of their photographs.

Classic Memories’ products are beautifully packaged and competitively priced and can be ordered using a simple online ordering process. Give yourself or a family member a personalized, thoughtful, and memorable gift. Place your online order today!

For more information on products and to review samples, please visit: http://www.classicmemories.com
